title: Effectively, I am a cobra dressed as sona.
body:
I recently started playing Sona a substantial amount.
I've found her quite enjoyable and really find movement speed on her effective as an in and out escape making use of strategy rather than all out AP burst damage. I enjoy the small amounts of damage I do get off as I also do so in a way that makes the opponent either shrink away in fear or round back in a panic so my ADC can jump on their back and possibly punch their heart through their chest with what ever axe/arrow/giant shurakan thing. etc etc .

I realize she has great potential for AP bursting people with combos and quick moving. 
However I haven't really experienced other items I liked on her apart from {{item:3069}} {{item:2049}} {{item:3504}} {{item:3151}}{{item:3285}} {{item:3290}}   Maybe I could try{{item:3115}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3152}} {{item:3222}} 

I pretty much want to try other builds but I really enjoy the one I've been doing recently as it really seem to work effectively with my style of play.
I tend to always be searching for a whole team fight I'll never really engage unless there are more than 2 of us there ( unless it's just in lane faze and I have sight stone available )

I tend to really think about the strategic team fight compositions. However I do understand that I am not at my best as I still die.
Some games I wont at all some games I'll die enough that I'll want to quite for all of .000001 of a second and then realize that surrendering is for pussies who can't defend. So I defend. 
Try harder, think clearer and focus so much more that it's enough to notice a difference in play almost immediately.
Take a deep breath. Take a few moments to think ahead, check your map check your team mates, check yourself. 
Move forward.

Oh and quick tip, keep your mouth shut. Don't blame anyone. Not even yourself. See your mistake, learn, and adapt.

x"D{{champion:34}} {{item:3840}}
